code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{allInstructors}from"../../utils/APIRoutes";import axios from"axios";import'./Instructors.css';import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Instructors(_ref){let{user}=_ref;const[instructors,setInstructors]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchInstructors=async()=>{try{if(user){const response=await axios.get("".concat(allInstructors,"/").concat(user._id));setInstructors(response.data);}}catch(error){console.error(error);}};fetchInstructors();},[user]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-instructors",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"heading-instructors",children:" Our Instructors"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-list-instructors",children:instructors.map(instructor=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-instructors",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"/individualinstructor/".concat(instructor.username),state:{instructorUsername:instructor.username}},className:"card-link-instructors",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-content-instructors",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"instructor-name-instructors",children:instructor.username})})})},instructor._id))})]});}
